attributes.action: Stop Bill's, Mortgage, Rent, Loan, Credit Bill. Companies should'nt charge us.
attributes.additional_details: Many of us facing finance issue as many of us would not able to go back to the job. Many of us also will not able to get any income for at least 3 months.
attributes.background:
I would like the Government should help us by informing the banks to freeze the out going payment for Energy Companies, Mortgage Companies, Loan Companies and Bank Loan.

We should not pay any sort of Bill's for at least 3 months. All loan should be clear off with out any payment.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
